taskDescription:
Simplify <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <msup>
      <mrow>
        <mo>(</mo>
        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
          <mfrac>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>3</mn>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mi>a</mi>
                  <mn>2</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
            </mrow>
            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
              <mn>4</mn>
              <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                <msup>
                  <mi>b</mi>
                  <mn>5</mn>
                </msup>
              </mrow>
            </mrow>
          </mfrac>
        </mrow>
        <mo>)</mo>
      </mrow>
      <mn>6</mn>
    </msup>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\left( {\frac{{3{a^2}}}{{4{b^5}}}} \right)^6}</annotation></semantics></math>.
detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mfrac>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mn>3</mn>
          <mn>6</mn>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mi>a</mi>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>12</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mn>4</mn>
          <mn>6</mn>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
      <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
        <msup>
          <mi>b</mi>
          <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
            <mn>30</mn>
          </mrow>
        </msup>
      </mrow>
    </mrow>
  </mfrac>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\frac{{{3^6}{a^{12}}}}{{{4^6}{b^{30}}}}</annotation></semantics></math>
